snippet.title: Guncaster - I Need a Hero
snippet.description:
As you can see, dragons are not only capable of being some castle's guard dogs, preventing from princess-snatching, but might as well rescue worlds - with all the flair (and destruction) they can muster!

Probably my most impressive video so far (all hail the two days I have spent learning to rig this thing, as I have got myself some brandspanking-new software for this. Encoding, swearing, rigging again, and encoding for three times as long!), it's also a little tribute to the people who have been helping me and putting up with my shit through all these years now, as of some of their history reaches far long and beyond this mod, or even RO, but that doesn't mean that freshmen are any less important!

Oh, and here's the aforementioned link to the video which explains how can he possibly reload those shotguns one-handedly, in case you're a picky bastard, heh. It's of course only a rough idea, as I imagine him just putting the buttstock of the weapon around his hip and arm area, and then pumping the hell out of it, as I don't think this method would work while you're running like over 50 miles per hour. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ftTB7ZnPruA&t=49s

And just in case you're too freaking lazy to watch till the end, credit page's here as well.

Topic/Mod link:
http://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=37066

Maps:
(Heretic) Curse of D'Sparil - Kristus
(Hexen) Shadows of Chronos - Kaiser
(Doom 2) Hellbound - Z86

Holding out for a Hero - Bonnie Tyler
Deadly Sinners - Three Inches of Blood
Enclave OST - Light 02a
